title: Hickenlooper inks pacts, lobbies for Noble Energy
text:

John Hickenlooper mentioned to him that Denver-based Colorado Serum Company was finding that most of the animal-vaccine products that it tried to export to his country were getting blocked by regulators.  //on9news.tv/1S0RgDs   Join the Conversation To   Hickenlooper inks pacts, lobbies for Noble Energy Denver Business Journal, news source 10:08 a.m. MDT October 23, 2015 Colorado Gov. John Hickenlooper. CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
DENVER BUSINESS JOURNAL - While meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu earlier this week, Gov. John Hickenlooper mentioned to him that Denver-based Colorado Serum Company was finding that most of the animal-vaccine products that it tried to export to his country were getting blocked by regulators. 
Netanyahu immediately picked up a phone, called a cabinet official, and asked him to get back to him about why that was happening. 
Having just returned from a two-week trade mission to China, Japan, Turkey and Israel, Hickenlooper is still waiting to hear about whether barriers have been lifted for the local firm. 
Read more from the Denver Business Journal: http://bit.ly/1LrBb7u .
